doc_description: This document is an investment agreement between MSP Recovery, LLC, Hazel Holdings I LLC, and other related entities. It outlines the terms and conditions under which Hazel Holdings I LLC will purchase equity interests from MSP Recovery, LLC, including definitions, representations, warranties, covenants, and indemnification clauses. The agreement also includes details about the purchase price, closing conditions, and other legal and financial obligations of the parties involved.

structure.title: Investment Agreement Introduction
structure.summary: This section introduces the investment agreement, including the parties involved and the date of the agreement.
structure.text: INVESTMENT AGREEMENT among MSP Recovery, LLC, each Acquired Company, and Hazel Holdings I LLC dated as of March 29, 2023.
